member.name: T:SticKartScoresAzureWebRole.ScoresWcfDataService
member.summary: Defines the high score and matchmaking data service.

member.name: M:SticKartScoresAzureWebRole.ScoresWcfDataService.InitializeService(System.Data.Services.DataServiceConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes the service and sets access rules.
member.param: The data service configuration.

member.name: M:SticKartScoresAzureWebRole.ScoresWcfDataService.GetWinRatio(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the player's win to loss ratio.
member.param: The player id.
member.returns: The player's win to loss ratio.

member.name: M:SticKartScoresAzureWebRole.ScoresWcfDataService.RegisterPlayer(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Registers a player with the matchmaking service.
member.param: The player's name.
The player's password.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the player was added or not.

member.name: M:SticKartScoresAzureWebRole.ScoresWcfDataService.AddActivePlayerWithIp(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a player to the matchmaking table if they are registered with the service.
member.param: The specific player ip.
The port the player is waiting to play on.
The player's name.
The player's password.
A value indicating whether the player should be registered as a host or client.

member.name: M:SticKartScoresAzureWebRole.ScoresWcfDataService.AddActivePlayer(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a player to the matchmaking table if they are registered with the service.
member.param: The port the player is waiting to play on.
The player's name.
The player's password.
A value indicating whether the player should be registered as a host or client.

member.name: M:SticKartScoresAzureWebRole.ScoresWcfDataService.SetPlayerInGame(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the player's state to in game in the matchmaking lobby.
member.param: The player's id.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the update was successful or not.

member.name: M:SticKartScoresAzureWebRole.ScoresWcfDataService.AreOpponentsAvailable(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks whether there are any opponents available or not.
member.param: A value indicating whether to look for hosts or clients.
member.returns: A value indicating whether any opponents are available or not.

member.name: M:SticKartScoresAzureWebRole.ScoresWcfDataService.GetNextOpponentAddress(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the next available opponent's address and port to play on.
member.param: A value indicating whether to search for hosts or clients.
The player's id.
member.returns: The next available opponent's address and game port.

member.name: M:SticKartScoresAzureWebRole.ScoresWcfDataService.RemoveFromActivePlayers(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes a player from the matchmaking table and updates their statistics.
member.param: The player's id.
A value indicating whether the game finished correctly or not.
A value indicating whether the player won or not.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the player was removed successfully or not.
